business.name: Smile Dental Clinic
business.whatsapp_message: Hi, I'd like to book a dental appointment at Smile Dental Clinic.

doctors.name: Dr. Amanpreet Singh
doctors.title: BDS, MDS (Orthodontics)
doctors.bio: Dr. Amanpreet Singh is a highly skilled dentist with over 12 years of experience in orthodontics and cosmetic dentistry. He is committed to providing pain-free, modern dental care using the latest technology.

services.name: Teeth Cleaning & Polishing
services.description: Professional cleaning to remove plaque and tartar for a brighter, healthier smile.

services.name: Root Canal Treatment
services.description: Pain-free root canal therapy to save damaged teeth using modern techniques.

services.name: Dental Implants
services.description: Permanent tooth replacement with natural-looking implants for a confident smile.

services.name: Teeth Whitening
services.description: Advanced whitening treatments to brighten your smile by several shades.

services.name: Braces & Orthodontics
services.description: Straighten teeth with traditional braces or clear aligners for all ages.

services.name: Crowns & Bridges
services.description: Custom-made crowns and bridges to restore damaged or missing teeth.

services.name: Tooth Extraction
services.description: Safe and gentle tooth removal with minimal discomfort and quick recovery.

services.name: Emergency Dental Care
services.description: Immediate care for dental emergencies including pain, trauma, and infections.

testimonials.name: Rajinder K.
testimonials.text: Excellent dental care! Dr. Amanpreet was very gentle and professional. The clinic is modern and hygienic. Highly recommended!

testimonials.name: Simran P.
testimonials.text: Got my braces done here and the results are amazing. The staff is very friendly and the treatment was pain-free.

testimonials.name: Gurpreet S.
testimonials.text: Best dental clinic in Ludhiana! I've been coming here for years. Always a great experience with amazing results.

seo.title: Smile Dental Clinic - Best Dentist in Ludhiana | Dental Implants, Braces & More
seo.description: Smile Dental Clinic in Model Town, Ludhiana offers professional dental care including teeth cleaning, root canal, implants, braces and more. Book your appointment today!
seo.keywords: dentist ludhiana, dental clinic ludhiana, teeth cleaning, root canal, dental implants, braces ludhiana, Smile Dental Clinic
